#summary How to install extensions.

This is applicable to version 1.5 and later only.

Step 1. Shut down Gridworks.

Step 2. Download the extension .zip file and unzip it to a directory.

Step 3. Copy that directory you've just unzipped to the `extensions` directory, which can be found 

  * On Mac OSX: switch to the Finder application and invoke its menu Go > Go to Folder. Enter
{{{
  /Applications/Gridworks.app/Contents/Resources/webapp/extensions
}}}
  * On Windows: TODO
  * On `*`nix: TODO

Step 4. Start Gridworks up again.
